file_content.text: Wha--what? No! No, get away from me! Stay back! I'll kill you!
No... no, I'm sorry. Please, help me. My head... everything keeps spinning. I can't think straight.
See what you can do for him, Dorne.
Medic!
Agent? Focus on my eyes, sir. I need you to take deep, slow breaths.
I'm with the Republic. I'm here to help.
Stay calm.
Thank you... please help.
The Dark Heart has this effect on people. You have to fight it!
This place is getting to you.
Fight it... no more fighting.
The only survivor is insane. Perfect.
So much for our intel.
No... not crazy. They were crazy, I'm not crazy!
Let me see what I can do for him. Sir? Sir, I need you to look at me. Take deep, concentrated breaths.
My team... we crashed. We took shelter here, but they were plotting. Plotting behind their eyes.
I had to do it. They would have killed me. If I hadn't killed them, they would've killed me!
I need to know where the Imps are hiding that bomb, agent.
Try to focus.
Imperials... the mission! My team--what have I done?
Why would you shoot your own men?
You killed your teammates?
I... I don't know! What was I thinking? We were a team... we worked together for years....
Pull yourself together! I need the Imps' location, now!
Snap out of it! [Hit him.]
Ugh... what? The Imps... my team! The mission!
Take this. Take it! It has coordinates. The Imperials are there, tunneling. This will get you through the security door.
Tell their... tell their families... ugh!
Poor guy. Never even had a chance.
I hope I don't go down like that.
A rough way to go.
You won't. Not on my watch.
I'm with you there, Major.
Agent? I have no pulse. He's gone.
He was in bad shape, Elara. There was nothing more you could do.
You did your best.
Thank you. I just... I wish it had been enough.
As you say, Major.
An unworthy end for a dedicated servant of the Republic. The Empire will answer for this.
Rough way to go out. Should've been more careful.
You're a real jerk, you know that?
Shut up, Vik.
It's how I got where I am today.
His troubles are at an end, now. His journey ends in a peace that seemed lost forever.
This agent--all of these agents--gave their lives to stop the Empire. Let's make it count.
We'll honor his sacrifice.
We'd better act on this intel before the Imps relocate.
Ready to move?
Ready and able, Major!
Yuun is ready, Major.
The sooner we're away from this insanity, the better.
I hate this planet.
He's gone, isn't he? The whole team is gone. They were only supposed to observe--how could this happen?
We have the Imps' location, sir--we need to strike now.
Focus on the mission.
You're right. You're... yes. You're right.
You can plan the op, but you can never predict the outcome.
War isn't pretty.
But they were experienced field agents! They should've had no problems at all.
These men died because you wanted to play war!
This is your fault!
No. No, I didn't kill those men.
I want you to go to those coordinates, Major. I want you to make the Imperials pay.
Use all necessary force. Evran out.
